hand.column_description: The starting maximum hand size total modifier.
hand.value_description: A + or - character precedes an integer.   positive maximum hand size: +1, +2, .... negative maximum hand size: -1, .... neural maximum hand size: 0....

availability.column_description: A list of the card's available printing types.

uuid.column_description: The universal unique identifier (v5) generated by MTGJSON. Each entry is unique.

isfullart.column_description: If the card has full artwork.

originaltype.value_description: The type of the card as originally printed. Includes any supertypes and subtypes.

side.column_description: The identifier of the card side.
side.value_description: Used on cards with multiple faces on the same card.  if this value is empty, then it means this card doesn't have multiple faces on the same card.

basesetsize.column_description: The number of cards in the set.

mtgocode.column_description: The set code for the set as it appears on Magic: The Gathering Online
mtgocode.value_description: if the value is null or empty, then it doesn't appear on Magic: The Gathering Online
